ENGLISH: United Nations General Assembly Resolution 41/128, The Declaration on the Right to Development.
United Nations General Assembly Resolution 41/128, The Declaration on the Right to Development, has been opened for voting.
Shall we receive notifications when nations decide their vote on the current UN Resolution undergoing a vote?\nThese can be turned off at any time by an international decision.
United Nations General Assembly Resolution 41/128, The Declaration on the Right to Development, has been defeated by vote in the United Nations General Assembly.
United Nations General Assembly Resolution 41/128, The Declaration on the Right to Development, has passed its vote in the United Nations General Assembly.
We have the opportunity to vote on United Nations General Assembly Resolution 41/128, The Declaration on the Right to Development.\nWe can either vote For it, Abstain, or vote Against it.
